item.title: RKLB
item.description: score:40 Chances: Rocket Lab (RKLB) shares have skyrocketed after the company secured a $515 million government contract, indicating a strong potential for growth and revenue. The successful launch of Rocket Lab’s tenth Electron rocket and the deployment of a satellite for a Japan-based Earth imaging company showcase the company’s consistent execution and expansion in the space industry.
